name: Python 3.12
updateContentCommand: [ -f packages.txt ] && sudo apt update && sudo apt upgrade -y && sudo xargs apt install -y <packages.txt; curl -LsSf https://astral.sh/uv/install.sh | sh && source $HOME/.cargo/env && uv sync --extra dev --all-groups || echo '⚠️ uv not installed or sync failed'; echo '✅ Packages installed and Requirements met'

postAttachCommand.server: uv run streamlit run app.py --server.enableCORS false --server.enableXsrfProtection false
